questions.question: Where are the markets
questions.answer: B1, E3, C1, D6 (More to come)

questions.question: ccc
questions.answer:
1: Check your keybinding in options for "toggle console", you might need to assign a different key
	a.*(for English keyboards it's typically the Tilde/Tick key `)*
2: Exit the menu & open the console with the assigned key
3: Type ccc and hit enter. Coordinates will be saved into your clipboard.
3: Then tab out to discord and paste (ctrl + v) into support.
